pages.text: All metals have a different temperature at which they are workable, and another temperature at which they will melt. The next few pages show working and melting points of common metals.$(br2)
Note: based on your tooltip setting (Advanced vs. Normal) these temperatures will show in exact values (i.e. 23.5 C) or color indicators (i.e. $(dark red) or $(yellow white))
